src: 大家好！
tgt: Hello everyone!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 我是来自汉代的“益延寿”瓦的拓片。
tgt: I am a rubbing from the Han Dynasty's "Yi Yanshou" tile.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 我的身材小巧玲珑，最大直径不过12.5厘米。
tgt: My figure is small and exquisite, with a maximum diameter of only 12.5 centimeters.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 瓦身上“益延寿”三个篆书大字顶天立地般竖排着，方方正正的字形紧密相连，从上到下写得满满当当，尽显大气磅礴，仿佛在诉说着千年前的庄重与祈愿。
tgt: On the tile body, the three large seal script characters "Yi Yanshou" stand tall and upright in a vertical arrangement.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 再看当面两侧，曲线枝蔓纹优雅舒展，枝蔓间还镶嵌着两枚乳丁，简洁的线条勾勒出漂亮的图案，每一处细节都凝聚着汉代匠人的巧思。
tgt: The square and orderly characters are closely connected, filling the space from top to bottom, exuding a majestic and grand aura, as if narrating the solemnity and prayers of a thousand years ago.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 这就是我，承载着历史韵味，又别具风格的“益延寿”瓦拓片。
tgt: Looking at the two sides of the tile face, the curved vine patterns stretch gracefully, with two nipple-shaped studs embedded among the vines.
title: 文物 · history#1

src:
100 延年益寿 1
嗨！
tgt: The simple lines outline a beautiful pattern, with every detail embodying the ingenuity of Han Dynasty craftsmen.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 大家好呀！
tgt: This is me—the "Yi Yanshou" tile rubbing, carrying the charm of history and a unique style.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 我是“延年益寿”瓦当拓片，来自遥远的汉代！
tgt: 100 Prolonging Life and Adding Years 1 Hey!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 在陕西省西安市汉长安城遗址，大家总能频繁见到我的“真身”，毕竟那里可是我的“老家”呢！
tgt: Hello, everyone!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 瞧瞧我这“大块头”，最大直径足足有20.7厘米，在瓦当家族里，堪称“巨无霸”啦！
tgt: I am the "Prolonging Life and Adding Years" eaves tile rubbing, hailing from the distant Han Dynasty!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 我的边轮内侧藏着一圈凸弦纹，就像给自己戴了条精致的项链；
tgt: At the site of the Han Chang'an City in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, you can frequently see my "true form," after all, that is my "hometown"!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 当心还有个可爱的圆突，圆突外面同样围着一圈凸弦纹，是不是超有设计感？
tgt: Look at my "big size"—the maximum diameter reaches a full 20.7 centimeters, making me a "giant" among the eaves tile family!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 再看我的“脸面”——当面被双线十字巧妙地分成四个“小房间”，每个“小房间”都“住”着一个端庄规整的字。
tgt: Inside my border wheel hides a circle of raised string patterns, as if I’ve adorned myself with an exquisite necklace;
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 从右边竖着读，就是“延—年—益—寿”啦！
tgt: at the center, there’s also a lovely round protrusion, surrounded by another circle of raised string patterns—isn’t that superbly designed?
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 瓦文结体也大有讲究，就是能随圆就方，用方方正正的线条替代圆润，整体造型严谨又不失独特。
tgt: Now, look at my "face"—the front is cleverly divided into four "small compartments" by a double-line cross, and each "small compartment" "houses" a dignified and orderly character.
title: 文物 · history#1

src:
历经千年岁月，我依然魅力不减，
“延年益寿”是人类共同的愿望，也是彼此间最美好的祝福。
tgt: Reading vertically from the right, it spells "Prolonging Life and Adding Years"!
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 我在此恭祝各位“延年益寿”，健康长寿！
tgt: The structure of the tile inscription is also meticulously crafted, adapting to the shape of the circle with square forms, replacing curves with straight, square lines, resulting in a rigorous yet unique overall design.
title: 文物 · history#1

src: 大家好！
tgt: Hello everyone!
